name: MergeBeam
description:
Collect batteries on the floor to charge turrets, avoid the incoming damage while fighting the boss. Merge turrets by pressing buttons on the walls to strengthen them.

Controls:

w,a,s,d

Do not fall! Its a bug that character doesn't die =) 


Game Targets:

1. Collect energy cells

2. Deliver the cell to the turret platform

3. Push the button to merge turrets level

4. Survive and gather as many points as possible

5. Player has little health. Although you can't see it, survive as long as possible with a chance of taking a few hits

Graphics: Artem Potapov, Konstantin Melikian, Mark Kangin
Design: Artem Potapov, Konstantin Melikian
Code: Mark Kangin, Artur Popov
